root: ^Well, well, well. Look what the cat dragged in. Album Scratch.
^I've been watching you for some time.
^You!! You are the reason for all of this! You killed my Aunt Judy!
^I guess the cat’s out of the bag. That old lady was no match for me.
^It's time to face the music, Album. I'm going to put an end to this tacky store and to you once and for all.
^Never! This store is my Aunt Judy's legacy! You mess with the cat, you get the claws!
